press-release.release-date:
June 23, 2003
This document is standard press release delivered in XML format with each definable section broken out into it's own tag. Presumably this is done to allow it to be reprocessed into other formats later at some future date. This press release isn't about anything or anyone. While it is modeled after a software industry press release it simply serves to help demonstrate some of the possible configurations supported by the Repository Loader (RL.)
Very! In fact, you will see this exact text repeated over and over again in the "material" included in the example Dynamo module included with the Repository Loader (RL.)
RL.Example
RL.Example is a submodule that includes base RL module and attempts to illustrate how the framework can be used to make integrating file system based data with ATG Repositories.
RL
RL is the base module that helps customers get started using the Repository Loader framework.
